import React from 'react' import Book from './Book' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const BookList = props => { const { books, updateBookShelf } = this.props const shelves = [ { type: 'currReading', title: 'Currently Reading' }, { type: 'wannaRead', title: 'Want to Read' }, { type: 'read', title: 'Read' } ] const { currReading, wannaRead, read } = this.state return (

Currently Reading

    {currReading.map(book => ())}

Want to Read

    {wannaRead.map(book => ())}

Read

    {read.map(book => ())}
) } BooksList.propTypes = { books: PropTypes.array.isRequired, updateBookShelf: PropTypes.func.isRequired } export default BooksList
